artefact.description: Find your local practical driving test centre - search by postcode
artefact.introduction: Enter your postcode to find a practical driving test centre near you.

artefact.title: Driving tests, motorcycle tests and learning to drive

details.description: Booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees, compulsory basic training

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
Becoming an instructor, applying for licences, booking tests and rules

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

artefact.title: Book your practical driving or riding test

details.description: Book your practical driving or riding test from £62 using the only official driving test booking service - book online or by phone or post, includes ADI tests 2 and 3

artefact.title: Change the date of your practical test

details.description: Change your practical driving or riding test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at
